title: game crash
body: bloody kidding me! After I updated LOL,I started my first game, LOL crashed, and then it was being repairing for about 10 mins, and then i had a punishment for being leaving the game! WTF is that!

replies.body:
Ouch, that's a rough thing to happen during a match. Corrupt files usually happen if there's a poor connection to our servers during patching that causes some files to go missing or if there are issues with your system's disk, so if this happens again, we'll need to look into those factors.

Let me know if you have any questions.
